title: Fluid pressure problems : r/AskPhysics - Reddit
body: A student places their finger over the top opening of the straw and lifts the straw vertically a distance d with the water in the straw staying in the straw. a. Enter an expression for the difference in pressure ΔP = PB - PA between points B and A of the water, in terms of d, the density of the water, ρ, and the acceleration due to gravity, g
